mapper.insert: insert into dbo.hierarchy( HID, CellName, eNodeBName, eNodeBID, CellID, Latitude, Longitude, Azimuth )values( #{HID}, #{CellName}, #{eNodeBName}, #{eNodeBID}, #{CellID}, #{Latitude}, #{Longitude}, #{Azimuth} )
insert into dbo.stationInformation( id, ENodeBID, Longitude, Latitude, Azimuth, Supplier )values( #{id}, #{ENodeBID}, #{Longitude}, #{Latitude}, #{Azimuth}, #{Supplier} )

insert into dbo.communityInformation( id, ENodeBID, CellID, Longitude, Latitude, SectorID, PCI, Azimuth )values( #{id}, #{ENodeBID}, #{CellID}, #{Longitude}, #{Latitude}, #{SectorID}, #{PCI}, #{Azimuth} )
mapper.select: select Distinct stf.*,hi.eNodeBName from StationInformation stf inner join hierarchy hi on stf.ENodeBID = hi.eNodeBID
select COUNT (*) from stationInformation WHERE ENodeBID = #{num}
select COUNT (*) from communityinformation WHERE NumberH = #{num}
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM qunSummary ORDER BY [Time] DESC

SELECT TOP 7 sum(SumUsers) AS SumUsers, sum(ProtocolFlow) AS ProtocolFlow, AVG(PageOpenRate) AS PageOpenRate, AVG(PageRate) AS PageRate, AVG(VedioDownRate) AS VedioDownRate, AVG(VedioStopRate) AS VedioStopRate, AVG(MessageRate) AS MessageRate, AVG(GameRate) AS GameRate, convert(varchar(5),[Time],105) AS [Time] FROM qunSummary GROUP BY convert(varchar(5),[Time],105) ORDER BY [Time] DESC
SELECT SumUsers,SumFlow,Longitude,Latitude FROM uploadData uda inner join dbo.communityInformation com on com.CellID = uda.CellID and com.ENodeBID=uda.ENodeBID
select TOP 7 SUM(SumFlow) AS Flow,ENodeBID,CellID FROM uploadData GROUP BY ENodeBID,CellID ORDER BY Flow DESC
select SUM(ProtocolFlow) flow,SUM(ProtocolNumber) num,ProtocolType FROM qunSummary GROUP BY ProtocolType
select SUM(ProtocolFlow) nflow,SUM(ProtocolNumber) nnum FROM qunSummary
